extendedInfo.description: Shanghai's best metro map! Up-to-date with all the metro lines for 2013; Works offline; Routeplanner, GPS, Google Maps; English and Chinese included.WHY EXPLOREMETRO?1. Fully up-to-date for 2013Accurate metro map, includes every station on every line. Free updates for future station openings and timetable changes.2. Designed for AndroidSupports all devices running Android 2.2 or higher. Designed to use the latest Android technologies like the Action Bar, HDPI screens and global search.3. Google Maps for every station Need to get your bearings at a station? Integrated Google Maps show you metro exits and nearby streets for every station.4. Route-planner A really easy route-planner. Get route, time and price information for any journey with just three taps. 5. "Find my nearest station" Using your GPS, see a list of the closest metro stations to your current location. 6. Works offline Everything works without an Internet connection. Search stations and plan routes on the go.SUGGESTIONSWe'd love to hear your comments and suggestions on ways to improve the app. Please contact us via support@exploremetro.com, as we can't respond to comments left in the reviews.

reviews.title: App crashing
reviews.comment: The recent update is making the app crash while using the location service and looking for stations around you. Device - Nexus 4
reviews.author: Manoj Odunghat

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Useful app for foreigners in Shanghai.
reviews.author: Umut Utku Emer

reviews.title: You need this
reviews.comment: Can\'t believe how many times time app saved my butt. You NEED this app when visiting shanghai
reviews.author: Jake Bristow

reviews.title: Saved My Life
reviews.comment: This is the best metro app in Shanghai. I use it every day and it has made my life so much easier. I would be hopeless without it. The estimated time it gives from station to station is never accurate. If I rely on it I am always late, but if you take it\'s estimation and add 15 or so minutes you\'ll be fine. Thank you so much for making this free app and thank you for making routine updates. :)
reviews.author: Paul Cheesebrow

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Really good for planning if you\'re traveling in shanghai. Works offline, too.
reviews.author: Neil Grainger

reviews.title: Ad pop up
reviews.comment: Today every time I opened the software I got a daily free app pop up which is really annoying. Other than that it\'s a useful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good/handy, but with very annoying adverts!

reviews.title: Simply awesome!
reviews.comment: A must have app whether you are visiting Shanghai or living there.

reviews.title: Highly needed
reviews.comment: I use this app.often and it comes in handy while I go galavanting most of the time in Shanghai.For a non-chinese speaker,this helps a lot instead of carrying a thick book or map

reviews.comment: Best app for shanghai subway. All details are correct. Best thing its free. Keep it up.

reviews.title: Everything you need
reviews.comment: Well the dev finally implemented zoom, which makes the map totally usable again. Best Shanghai metro app out there. Thanks for finally updating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot Install Ad-free Version in China
reviews.comment: Apparently the powers that be feel threatened by handy metro maps.  I am currently residing in Shanghai and upon trying to purchase the VIP (i.e., ad-free) version was informed by Google\'s Play Store that the VIP version is not available in China.  ExploreMetro might consider producing a VIP version that does not link to certain bourgeois social media platforms.  Also, I concur with other reviewers that a zoom function (which I would guess may be somewhat of a technical challenge) would be highly useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best by far
reviews.comment: This was my metro Bible while in Shanghai.  Get this application and you won\'t look back.
reviews.author: Russell Sky

reviews.comment: Perfect app for Shanghai subway. All routes, planning, times, costs! Regular updates.
reviews.author: A Google User
